name: Lacuna (johnrichard)
description:
Pilot your ship to eliminate the endless wave of Blights. Choose between you having 1 hp and your enemies having 1 hp.

Controls:

  • mouse - move
  • left mouse button - shoot
  • escape - exit game/return to menu

This game was made as a submission for the One Hour Game Jam. The game jam theme was "1hp".
